Nine injured in London incident involving 'corrosive substance', police sayNine people, including two children, were injured on Wednesday in an incident involving a "corrosive substance" in Clapham, in south London, the Metropolitan Police said. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 22:36:05 GMT AB3SKPOKGBJPFD2GNKRPX72CW4 https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/nine-injured-incident-involving-tropical-substance-london-police-say-2024-01-31/Reuters世界英国
UK opposition Labour party pledge productivity fix in latest pitch to businessBritain's opposition Labour Party will pledge to fix Britain's stagnating productivity at a conference for businesses on Thursday, its latest charm offensive to companies and investors ahead of a national election expected this year. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 22:33:14 GMT TLNI5J7A5VILNN5OS6CLP2T5PQ https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/uk-opposition-labour-party-pledge-productivity-fix-latest-pitch-business-2024-01-31/Reuters世界英国
Commission to discuss new Russia sanctions proposal with EU countriesThe European Commission will start informal high-level meetings with member states on Saturday on the details of a proposed new set of sanctions against Russia for its invasion of Ukraine, three diplomatic sources said on Wednesday. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 22:29:54 GMT 3LX3NG72D5NBRMZFGGILHXUEKY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/commission-discuss-new-Russia-sanctions-proposal-with-eu-countries-2024-01-31/Julia Payne世界欧洲
Russian bomb damages hospital, prompts evacuation in northeastern Ukraine -officialsA Russian bomb struck a hospital in northeastern Ukraine on Wednesday, smashing windows and equipment and prompting the evacuation of dozens of patients, regional officials said. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 22:06:46 GMT 3J2GNRKU5BILPPNATN2YLUF2SQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-bomb-hits-hospital-northeastern-ukraine-four-injured-governor-2024-01-31/Reuters世界欧洲
State Dept says US actively pursuing the creation of a Palestinian stateThe United States is actively pursuing the establishment of an independent Palestinian state with security guarantees for Israel and exploring options with partners in the region, the State Department spokesperson said on Wednesday. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 21:39:53 GMT S7YDHAHFRZMWNODD7KRLEL3WI4 https://www.reuters.com/world/state-dept-says-us-actively-pursuing-creation-palestinian-state-2024-01-31/Simon Lewis, Humeyra Pamuk世界
Ethnic conflict kills 11 people in western CongoFighting between ethnic communities left 11 people dead in western Congo on Tuesday, a local authority and civil society leader said after their bodies were collected on Wednesday. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 21:17:11 GMT KJ7MZ75T6RKWXDTFVCM5EZ4IXI https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/ethnic-conflict-kills-11-people-western-congo-2024-01-31/Reuters世界非洲
Peru reopens train route to Machu Picchu after protests endPeruvian authorities have reopened the train route to Machu Picchu, the Andean country's railway operator said on Wednesday, after an agreement was struck to end protests that had blocked access to the famed Incan site and stranded tourists. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 21:14:53 GMT PST4ZLLCZRNNHOAO3ODA6FKCLE https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/peru-reopens-train-route-machu-picchu-after-protests-end-2024-01-31/Lucinda Elliott世界美洲
Yemen's Houthis say they targeted US merchant vessel -statementYemen's Houthis on Wednesday said their naval forces carried out an operation targeting an "American merchant ship" in the Gulf of Aden hours after firing missiles at U.S. Navy destroyer Gravely. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 20:24:59 GMT 7KFH2GC6OVO7FP7JS3JTZJA4NQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/yemens-houthis-say-they-targeted-us-merchant-vessel-statement-2024-01-31/Reuters世界中东
Cuba delays Feb. 1 fuel price hike, cites cyberattackCuba put off an unpopular five-fold increase in gasoline prices planned for Feb. 1 due to a cyberattack, Economy Vice Minister Mildrey Granadillo said on Wednesday, a sudden about-face hours before the hike was to take effect. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 20:21:52 GMT UZLJCO4E4FJR3LJJBGOSKHEQEU https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/cuba-delays-feb-1-fuel-price-hike-cites-cyberattack-2024-01-31/Dave Sherwood世界美洲
US needs to build Marshall Islands' trust over Cold War nuclear dump -US agencyThe U.S. energy secretary should build trust with the Republic of the Marshall Islands by developing a plan to communicate clearly over lingering threats from a radioactive waste dump left by U.S. nuclear weapons testing that is now seen at risk of floods from climate change, a U.S. agency said on Wednesday. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 19:42:54 GMT 5XDKYEG3PZJXJB4LSHDERBLZCI https://www.reuters.com/world/us-needs-build-marshall-islands-trust-over-cold-war-nuclear-dump-us-agency-2024-01-31/Timothy Gardner世界
Brazil authorities crack down on illegal pesticides tradeAn agency tasked with patrolling federal roads in Brazil has reported a surge in volumes of illegal pesticides seized from criminals in the last eight years, including a record 358 metric tons apprehended in 2022 when the country harvested close to 300 million tons of grains. Wed, 31 Jan 2024 19:24:46 GMT TENSDF42JBJCHJXYRETUY43KWU https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/brazil-authorities-crack-down-illegal-pesticides-trade-2024-01-31/Ana Mano世界美洲
